full_summary:
# Annual Environmental Component Follow-up for St. Lawrence Waterway Maintenance

## Overview

The Government of Canada invites proposals for the annual follow-up of the environmental component for the maintenance of the St. Lawrence Waterway. This project is governed by the [Impact Assessment Act (IA 2019)](/frameworks/Impact-Assessment-Act-2019-en), which established a framework for the application of Federal Environmental Effects Assessment.

## Scope of Work

The successful contractor will be responsible for the execution of sediment characterization activities required to comply with relevant legislation and requirements of Environment Canada and the Fisheries and Oceans Canada. This will involve laboratory physico-chemical analyses to feed the annual follow-up reports on this mandate.

## Reference Information

- **Contract Reference**: cb-4053-36777354
